Description_lang: Peroth'arn's sickly touch causes a random target to decay from within, instantly inflicting $105544s1 Shadow damage and $105544s2 Shadow damage every second for $105544d. Any healing done to the afflicted player causes the healer to suffer $108124s1% of the amount healed as Shadow damage.
AuraDescription_lang: Taking $105544s2 Shadow damage every second for $105544d. Any healing done to you will cause the healer to suffer $108124s1% of the amount healed as Shadow damage.
